}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== <!-- "AJT00C-1.0" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This is the same text found on the [[Belkin F9L1109 v1]]'s board.
This thing is using two [[Skyworks]] (''SiGe'') [http://www.rfmw.com/datasheets/skyworks/SE5022T_DS.pdf SE5022T] 5GHz Power Amplifiers :and two [[Skyworks]] [http://www.skyworksinc.com/uploads/documents/SKY85601_11_202865A.pdf SKY85601--11] SDPT Switch w/ LNA modules.
USB 3.0 interface, shell appearance is fairly similar to the AE1200 / AE2500 :The USB ID used is per the driver set for the [[Amped Wireless ACA1]].
{{WiFiCert|WFA19664|05/08/2013}} --> ===Models=== *[[Linksys WUSB6300]] • Dual Band Wireless-AC USB Adapter *[[Linksys WUSB6300 v2]] • AC1200 Wireless-AC USB Adapter :802.11ac Wireless Adapter [Realtek RTL8822BU] (AC1200) :FCC ID: K7S-03609 (2020-11-17) • WUBT-236AC73 (US/CA)<!--(WUSB6300V2-US/CA)-->
==See also== *[[SparkLAN WUBT-236ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 4.2, RTL8822BU, 802.11ac USB, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFT-237ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, RTL8822CE, 802.11ac M.2 A/E Key 2230, 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WNFT-238AX(BT)]] - '''WiFi 6''' + BT 5.2, 802.11ax/ac M.2 2230 (A/E Key), 2T2R *[[SparkLAN WUBT-239ACN(BT)]] - WiFi 5 + BT 5.0, RTL8822CU, 802.11ac USB Dongle, 2T2R
